location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 95 to William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: Reports news of French activities in the region and on the seizure of an English vessel. Via a letter from an Armenian merchant in Muscat it is reported that the government of Muscat has seized a French privateer. The latest developments from Persia are also reported - Schiras [Shiraz] is said to be under seige by Ally Morat Cahn [Ali Murad Khan] and his forces. An additional note on 9 August 1781 reports details of two French cruisers at Carrack [Kharg] island.
